title: Verizon Value Brands Offer You Some Last-Minute Holiday Deals
description: Didn't get all those gifts on time? Some of Verizon's brands are giving you another chance.
author: Ayomide Sadiq
excerpt: Didn't get all those gifts on time? Some of Verizon's brands are giving you another chance.
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. Life around the holidays can get pretty darn busy, and that sometimes means failing to tick off all of your material obligations for the holidays in time. It doesn't mean you don't care, but that's just how things go sometimes. In moments like that, you still need to get gifts for people, but a lot of those savings would have disappeared. Fortunately, Verizon Value Brands has your back, offering you a chance for some sweet mobile deals, even at the last moment. With brands like Total Wireless, Tracfone, and Straight Talk, you can still get that perfect tech gift and save a lot of money, even with the holidays so close. Total Wireless Gives You The Chance To Get Phones For Free Image: Total Wireless If you have cousins, nieces or nephews, sons or daughters, or any other kind of family member who you want to gift a phone to, there's nothing better than getting one for free. Savings don't get better than a $0 price tag, especially on a device that has a little bit of oomph to it. Fortunately, Total Wireless customers will be getting exactly that chance. If you bring your number over from another carrier, verify your identity, and subscribe to the Total 5G+ plan, you're going to get a Samsung Galaxy A35 5G for absolutely free. That's a pretty good deal since that's a solid mid-ranger. If you prefer Motorola, the Moto Edge (2024) is also available under the same conditions. Image: Samsung If you prefer a lower-tier plan and consequently, a lower-end device, bringing your number to Total's regular 5G plan (or 5G+, if you want) will let you walk away with a Galaxy A15 5G or a Moto G Power 5G for free. For The Girls Around You, The HMD Barbie Phone Is Available With A Lot Of Tracfone Value Packed In Image: HMD If you're looking to get a prepaid phone at a bargain or to give someone a prepaid phone at a bargain if that person is really into the idea of the color pink, then Tracfone has the perfect deal for you. HMD's Barbie Phone will be available at Tracfone for only $99, and not only are you going to be getting the cute little device itself, but it will come loaded with a full year of mobile service. That means 1,500 minutes for calls, 1,500 texts, and 1,500MB of data. Straight Talk Is Offering Discounted Phones As Part Of The “Yes-tivities” Image: Motorola Finally, if you happen to be a Straight Talk customer, the very best part is that you can get your hands on devices like the Motorola Moto G Power 5G and the Galaxy A25 through discounts on Walmart or their website. With phones locked to Straight Talk, you get big savings, such as the Moto G Power for just $40 or the Galaxy A25 for $80. And with the right plans, like an Extended Silver Plan for at least three months, you can get the Motorola Edge (2024). Through Tecno, Gionee, Vivo, Google, and now Samsung, Ayomide has always been an Android enthusiast. His current partner in crime is a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. You can find him playing Candy Crush or Call of Duty: Mobile, watching movies, and he is a big fan of trivia and quizzes. Previous Post
html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

Life around the holidays can get pretty darn busy, and that sometimes means failing to tick off all of your material obligations for the holidays in time. It doesn't mean you don't care, but that's just how things go sometimes. In moments like that, you still need to get gifts for people, but a lot of those savings would have disappeared.

Fortunately, Verizon Value Brands has your back, offering you a chance for some sweet mobile deals, even at the last moment. With brands like Total Wireless, Tracfone, and Straight Talk, you can still get that perfect tech gift and save a lot of money, even with the holidays so close.

Total Wireless Gives You The Chance To Get Phones For Free

If you have cousins, nieces or nephews, sons or daughters, or any other kind of family member who you want to gift a phone to, there's nothing better than getting one for free. Savings don't get better than a $0 price tag, especially on a device that has a little bit of oomph to it. Fortunately, Total Wireless customers will be getting exactly that chance.

If you bring your number over from another carrier, verify your identity, and subscribe to the Total 5G+ plan, you're going to get a Samsung Galaxy A35 5G for absolutely free. That's a pretty good deal since that's a solid mid-ranger. If you prefer Motorola, the Moto Edge (2024) is also available under the same conditions.

If you prefer a lower-tier plan and consequently, a lower-end device, bringing your number to Total's regular 5G plan (or 5G+, if you want) will let you walk away with a Galaxy A15 5G or a Moto G Power 5G for free.

For The Girls Around You, The HMD Barbie Phone Is Available With A Lot Of Tracfone Value Packed In

If you're looking to get a prepaid phone at a bargain or to give someone a prepaid phone at a bargain if that person is really into the idea of the color pink, then Tracfone has the perfect deal for you.

HMD's Barbie Phone will be available at Tracfone for only $99, and not only are you going to be getting the cute little device itself, but it will come loaded with a full year of mobile service. That means 1,500 minutes for calls, 1,500 texts, and 1,500MB of data.

Straight Talk Is Offering Discounted Phones As Part Of The “Yes-tivities”

Finally, if you happen to be a Straight Talk customer, the very best part is that you can get your hands on devices like the Motorola Moto G Power 5G and the Galaxy A25 through discounts on Walmart or their website.

With phones locked to Straight Talk, you get big savings, such as the Moto G Power for just $40 or the Galaxy A25 for $80. And with the right plans, like an Extended Silver Plan for at least three months, you can get the Motorola Edge (2024).

Through Tecno, Gionee, Vivo, Google, and now Samsung, Ayomide has always been an Android enthusiast. His current partner in crime is a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. You can find him playing Candy Crush or Call of Duty: Mobile, watching movies, and he is a big fan of trivia and quizzes.
